inclusion.criterion: avoid using PDE5i's for a month (washout)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 12 treatments, twice a week for 3 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: follow-up for long term after participation in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: incomplete response to active treatment on first round but patient is still unsatisfied
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recurring ED after shock wave therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: a minimum of two sexual attempts per month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IIEF-ED domain score ≤ 25 post screening, with or without PDE5i intake according to assessment on final visit of Shockwave previous treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects that did not respond at all to the first round as well as those that did not respond sufficiently
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: any pelvic surgery during the period after the first round
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any unstable medical or psychiatric condition, spinal cord injury, or penile anatomical abnormalities arising during this period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cardiovascular conditions that prevent sexual activity
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: recent Use of anti-androgens, or oral or injectable androgens
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: recent hormonal, neurologic, or psychological pathology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation. He had an excellent response to therapy but then presented with a rising white count and mildly elevated LDH. He received treatment but did not have much in the way of response.
